description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的国家级广播电台，前身为1940年12月30日开播的延安新华广播电台。自2018年起隶属于中央广播电视总台。
description.en: The national radio station of the People's Republic of China, formerly the Yan'an Xinhua Broadcasting Station which began broadcasting on December 30, 1940. It has been subordinate to the China Media Group since 2018.

description.zh-cn: 由原中央电视台、中央人民广播电台、中国国际广播电台于2018年合并组建的中华人民共和国国家广播电视机构，为国务院直属事业单位，由中共中央宣传部领导。
description.en: A state radio and television organization of the People's Republic of China formed in 2018 by the merger of the former China Central Television, China National Radio, and China Radio International. It is an institution directly under the State Council, led by the Propaganda Department of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中央人民广播电台的前身，于1940年12月30日在延安成立。
description.en: The predecessor of China National Radio, established in Yan'an on December 30, 1940.

nodes.id: 深化党和国家机构改革方案

zh-cn: 深化党和国家机构改革方案
en: Plan for Deepening Reform of Party and State Institutions

description.zh-cn: 由中共中央印发的文件，该方案决定将中央电视台、中央人民广播电台、中国国际广播电台合并，组建中央广播电视总台。
description.en: A document issued by the CPC Central Committee, which decided to merge China Central Television, China National Radio, and China Radio International to form the China Media Group.

description.zh-cn: 原中华人民共和国国家电视台，2018年并入新组建的中央广播电视总台。
description.en: The former national television broadcaster of the People's Republic of China, merged into the newly formed China Media Group in 2018.

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国际广播电台

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的国家级对外广播机构，前身为中央人民广播电台的对外广播部门（北京广播电台），2018年并入新组建的中央广播电视总台。
description.en: The state-level external broadcasting organization of the People's Republic of China, formerly the external broadcasting department of China National Radio (Radio Beijing). It was merged into the newly formed China Media Group in 2018.

en: Propaganda Department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会主管意识形态方面工作的综合职能部门。2018年起，中央广播电视总台归其领导。
description.en: A functional department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China responsible for ideological work. Since 2018, it has led the China Media Group.

nodes.id: 国家广播电影电视总局

zh-cn: 国家广播电影电视总局
en: State Administration of Radio, Film, and Television

description.zh-cn: 曾是中华人民共和国国务院负责广播、电影、电视等公共媒体的部门，于2002年批准中央人民广播电台更改英文名称。
description.en: Formerly a department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China responsible for public media such as radio, film, and television. It approved the change of China National Radio's English name in 2002.

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会
en: Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的中央领导机构。1949年批准将北京新华广播电台定名为中央人民广播电台。
description.en: The central leading body of the Chinese Communist Party. In 1949, it approved the naming of Beijing Xinhua Broadcasting Station as China National Radio.

description.zh-cn: 北京市的广播电台。曾于1955年至1961年间并入中央人民广播电台。
description.en: The radio station of Beijing Municipality. It was merged into China National Radio between 1955 and 1961.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中华人民共和国国务院总理。2010年曾到访中央人民广播电台并参与节目录制。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China. He visited China National Radio and participated in a program recording in 2010.

description.zh-cn: 中国媒体人，曾于1985年至1993年担任中央人民广播电台台长。
description.en: Chinese media professional, served as the Director of China National Radio from 1985 to 1993.

description.zh-cn: 中国媒体人，曾于1993年至1996年担任中央人民广播电台台长。
description.en: Chinese media professional, served as the Director of China National Radio from 1993 to 1996.

description.zh-cn: 中国媒体人，曾于1996年至1999年担任中央人民广播电台台长。
description.en: Chinese media professional, served as the Director of China National Radio from 1996 to 1999.

description.zh-cn: 中国媒体人，曾于1999年至2007年担任中央人民广播电台台长。
description.en: Chinese media professional, served as the Director of China National Radio from 1999 to 2007.

description.zh-cn: 中国媒体人，曾于2007年至2015年担任中央人民广播电台台长。
description.en: Chinese media professional, served as the Director of China National Radio from 2007 to 2015.

description.zh-cn: 中国媒体人，曾于2015年至2018年担任中央人民广播电台台长。
description.en: Chinese media professional, served as the Director of China National Radio from 2015 to 2018.

description.zh-cn: 中国的国家级应急广播机构，设在中央人民广播电台。
description.en: China's national emergency broadcasting organization, located at China National Radio.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院组成部门，主管交通运输工作。2009年与中央人民广播电台签署战略合作协议。
description.en: A constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, responsible for transportation. It signed a strategic cooperation agreement with China National Radio in 2009.

description.zh-cn: 美国电视购物频道。2010年与中央人民广播电台合作开办“央广购物”频道。
description.en: An American television shopping channel. It collaborated with China National Radio to launch the 'CNR Mall' channel in 2010.

description.zh-cn: 中央人民广播电台的前身是延安新华广播电台，后者于1940年12月30日在延安诞生，经过多次改名和迁移，最终定名为中央人民广播电台。
description.en: China National Radio's predecessor was the Yan'an Xinhua Broadcasting Station, which was established in Yan'an on December 30, 1940. After several name changes and relocations, it was finally named China National Radio.

relationships.source: 深化党和国家机构改革方案

description.zh-cn: 根据《深化党和国家机构改革方案》，原中央电视台、中央人民广播电台、中国国际广播电台合并，组建新的中央广播电视总台。
description.en: According to the 'Plan for Deepening Reform of Party and State Institutions', the former China Central Television, China National Radio, and China Radio International were merged to form the new China Media Group.

description.zh-cn: 2018年3月，中央人民广播电台建制撤销，并入新组建的中央广播电视总台。
description.en: In March 2018, the establishment of China National Radio was abolished, and it was merged into the newly formed China Media Group.

description.zh-cn: 2018年3月，中央电视台建制撤销，并入新组建的中央广播电视总台。
description.en: In March 2018, the establishment of China Central Television was abolished, and it was merged into the newly formed China Media Group.

description.zh-cn: 2018年3月，中国国际广播电台建制撤销，并入新组建的中央广播电视总台。
description.en: In March 2018, the establishment of China Radio International was abolished, and it was merged into the newly formed China Media Group.

description.zh-cn: 中央广播电视总台作为国务院直属事业单位，归入中共中央宣传部领导。
description.en: As an institution directly under the State Council, the China Media Group is under the leadership of the Propaganda Department of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 1949年12月5日，经中共中央批准，北京新华广播电台定名为“中央人民广播电台”。
description.en: On December 5, 1949, with the approval of the CPC Central Committee, Beijing Xinhua Broadcasting Station was named 'China National Radio'.

relationships.source: 国家广播电影电视总局

description.zh-cn: 2002年，经国家广播电影电视总局批准，中央人民广播电台的英文名称由“China People's Broadcasting Station”改为“China National Radio”。
description.en: In 2002, with the approval of the State Administration of Radio, Film, and Television, the English name of China National Radio was changed from 'China People's Broadcasting Station' to 'China National Radio'.

description.zh-cn: 1978年5月1日，原中央人民广播电台的对海外广播部门（北京广播电台）从中央台序列中独立分拆，成立了“中华人民共和国国际广播电台”。
description.en: On May 1, 1978, the external broadcasting department of the former China National Radio (Radio Beijing) was split off independently to establish the 'China Radio International'.

description.zh-cn: 1955年3月8日，北京人民广播电台并入中央人民广播电台，成为其对首都广播部。1961年1月1日，北京台重新独立建台。
description.en: On March 8, 1955, Beijing People's Broadcasting Station was merged into China National Radio, becoming its department for broadcasting to the capital. On January 1, 1961, the Beijing station was re-established as an independent entity.

description.zh-cn: 2010年12月26日，时任国务院总理温家宝到访中央人民广播电台，参与了中国之声特别节目的直播，并主持了纪念中国人民广播事业70周年座谈会，发表了重要讲话。
description.en: On December 26, 2010, then-Premier Wen Jiabao visited China National Radio, participated in a live special program on China National Radio, presided over a symposium commemorating the 70th anniversary of China's radio broadcasting, and delivered an important speech.

description.zh-cn: 国家应急广播中心于2013年12月3日在北京揭牌成立，设在中央人民广播电台。
description.en: The National Emergency Broadcasting Center was unveiled and established in Beijing on December 3, 2013, and is located at China National Radio.

description.zh-cn: 2009年3月13日，中央人民广播电台和交通运输部签署战略合作协议。
description.en: On March 13, 2009, China National Radio and the Ministry of Transport signed a strategic cooperation agreement.

description.zh-cn: 2010年6月，中央人民广播电台与QVC合作，开播第二套电视频道“央广购物”。
description.en: In June 2010, China National Radio collaborated with QVC to launch its second television channel, 'CNR Mall'.
